description: Tamworth score four times in the second half to thrash Wealdstone in the National League.
title: Tamworth 4-1 Wealdstone
title_page: Tamworth 4-1 Wealdstone: Hosts score all four goals in second half - BBC Sport
maintext:
Tamworth ran riot in the second half as they powered to a 4-1 home win over 10-man Wealdstone in the National League.
After a goalless opening period, the key moment came when the visitors had Craig Eastmond sent off for a second bookable offence with a minute of the restart.
Nathan Tshikuna was quick to take advantage, volleying in the opener in the 51st minute and adding a penalty soon after.
Dan Creaney and Alex Fletcher added to the scoreline before Anthony Georgiou grabbed a consolation deep into stoppage time.
